00048 void Simulation::inputFromFile(char *FileIn)
00049 {
00050   if(theReader==0)  this->theReader = new Reader(this);
00051   if(baseSystem==0)  this->baseSystem = new System( "baseSystem" );
00052   theReader->inputFromFile( FileIn );
00053 }

00056 void Simulation::run()
00057 {
00058   if(Simulation::contact == "GLOBAL" || Simulation::visualization == 1){
00059     this->theContact = new Contact(this, 10.);
00060     this->theContact->createPoints();
00061     this->theContact->createPolys();
00062     this->theContact->createDrawingObjects();
00063     if(Simulation::contact == "GLOBAL"){
00064       this->theContact->createDelaunay();
00065       this->theContact->createDrawingContactObjects();
00066     }
00067     this->theContact->drawObjects();
00068   }
00069   writeSystem();
00070   *outFile << "ANALYSIS " << endl;
00071 //   << "FILE " << "dis.dat" << endl;
00072   std::vector<Analysis*>::iterator itAnalysis;
00073   for ( itAnalysis = analysis.begin();
00074         itAnalysis!= analysis.end();
00075         ++itAnalysis
00076       )
00077     {
00078       int gdlSize = nodes.size() * Simulation::dimension;
00079       lmx::Vector<data_type> q( gdlSize );
00080       {
00081         lmx::ExactStopwatch sw;
00082 
00083         globalMass.resize( gdlSize, gdlSize );
00084         globalRHSForces.resize( gdlSize );
00085         globalInternalForces.resize( gdlSize );
00086         globalExternalForces.resize( gdlSize );
00087 
00088         int i=0;
00089         std::map<int,Node*>::iterator it_nodes;
00090         for ( it_nodes = nodes.begin();
00091               it_nodes!= nodes.end();
00092               ++it_nodes
00093             )
00094         {
00095           q(Simulation::dimension*i) = it_nodes->second->getx();
00096           q(Simulation::dimension*i+1) = it_nodes->second->gety();
00097           if (Simulation::getDim() == 3)
00098             q(Simulation::dimension*i+2) = it_nodes->second->getz();
00099           ++i;
00100         }
00101 
00102         baseSystem->calcMassMatrix();
00103         baseSystem->assembleMassMatrix( globalMass );
00104   //       cout << "q0 = " << q <<endl;
00105   //       cout << "qdot0 = " << qdot <<endl;
00106         if( (*itAnalysis)->type() == "DYNAMIC" ){
00107           lmx::Vector<data_type> qdot( gdlSize );
00108           // output first step data
00109           baseSystem->outputStep( q );
00110           (*itAnalysis)->solve( &q, &qdot );
00111         }
00112         else if( (*itAnalysis)->type() == "STATIC" ){
00113           // write initial configuration...
00114           *outFile << "0 "; //time=0
00115           for(size_type i=0; i<q.size(); ++i){
00116             *outFile << q(i) << " ";
00117           }
00118           *outFile << endl; //time=0
00119 
00120           (*itAnalysis)->solve( &q );
00121         }
00122       } // Output ExactStopwatch time
00123 
00124       std::ifstream disp("dis.dat");
00125       char a;
00126 
00127       if(outFile->is_open() ){
00128         while (disp.get(a)){
00129           outFile->put(a);
00130           outFile->flush();
00131         }
00132 
00133         // output extra flexible bodies data...
00134         baseSystem->outputToFile( outFile );
00135       }
00136 
00137 //       cout << "q(" << q.size()/2 << ") = " << q(q.size()/2) << endl;
00138 //       cout << "q(" << q.size()-1 << ") = " << q(q.size()-1) << endl;
00139 
00140       // output f_int of constraints...
00141       lmx::Vector<double> constr_forces(nodes.size()*dimension);
00142       baseSystem->assembleConstraintForces( constr_forces );
00143       for(size_type i=0; i< constr_forces.size(); ++i ){
00144         if(constr_forces(i) != 0. )
00145           cout << "R(" << i << ") = " << constr_forces(i) << endl;
00146       }
00147     }
00148 }
00149 
00150 void Simulation::writeSystem()
00151 {
00152   std::stringstream ss;
00153   ss << title << ".mec";
00154   outFile = new std::ofstream( ss.str().c_str() );
00155   *outFile << "DIMENSION " << Simulation::dimension << endl;
00156 
00157   *outFile << "SYSTEM" << endl;
00158 
00159   *outFile << "NODES" << endl;
00160   std::map<int,Node*>::iterator it_nodes;
00161   for ( it_nodes = nodes.begin(); it_nodes != nodes.end(); ++it_nodes ){
00162     *outFile
00163       << "\t" << it_nodes->first
00164       << "\t" << it_nodes->second->getx()
00165       << "\t" << it_nodes->second->gety()
00166       << "\t" << it_nodes->second->getz()
00167       << endl;
00168   }
00169   *outFile << "ENDNODES" << endl;
00170 
00171   *outFile << "RIGIDBODIES" << endl;
00172   baseSystem->writeRigidBodies( outFile );
00173   *outFile << "ENDRIGIDBODIES" << endl;
00174 
00175   *outFile << "FLEXBODIES" << endl;
00176   baseSystem->writeFlexBodies( outFile );
00177   *outFile << "ENDFLEXBODIES" << endl;
00178 
00179   *outFile << "ENDSYSTEM" << endl;
00180 }

00182 void Simulation::dynamicAcceleration( const lmx::Vector< data_type > & q,
00183                                const lmx::Vector< data_type > & qdot,
00184                                lmx::Vector< data_type > & qddot,
00185                                double time
00186                              )
00187 {
00188   globalMass.fillIdentity(0.);
00189   globalInternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00190   globalExternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00191 
00192   baseSystem->calcMassMatrix();
00193   baseSystem->calcInternalForces();
00194   baseSystem->calcExternalForces();
00195   baseSystem->assembleMassMatrix( globalMass );
00196   baseSystem->assembleInternalForces( globalInternalForces );
00197   baseSystem->assembleExternalForces( globalExternalForces );
00198   globalRHSForces = globalExternalForces;
00199   globalRHSForces -= globalInternalForces;
00200 
00201   lmx::LinearSystem<data_type> theLSolver( globalMass, qddot, globalRHSForces );
00202   theLSolver.solveYourself();
00203 //   cout << "initial_acceleration :" << qddot << endl;
00204 }

00206 void Simulation::dynamicResidue( lmx::Vector< data_type > & residue,
00207                           const lmx::Vector< data_type > & q,
00208                           const lmx::Vector< data_type > & qdot,
00209                           const lmx::Vector< data_type > & qddot,
00210                           double time
00211                         )
00212 {
00213   std::map<int,Node*>::iterator itNodes;
00214   for( itNodes = nodes.begin();
00215        itNodes!= nodes.end();
00216        ++itNodes
00217      )
00218   {
00219     itNodes->second->setx( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) ) );
00220     itNodes->second->sety( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) + 1 ) );
00221     if (Simulation::getDim() == 3)
00222       itNodes->second->setz( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) + 2 ) );
00223   }
00224 // At this time globalMass is always the same...
00225 // so the commented lines increment efficiency by 12% aprox.
00226 
00227 //   globalMass.fillIdentity(0.);
00228   globalInternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00229   globalExternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00230 
00231 //   baseSystem->calcMassMatrix();
00232   baseSystem->calcInternalForces();
00233   baseSystem->calcExternalForces();
00234 //   baseSystem->assembleMassMatrix( globalMass );
00235   baseSystem->assembleInternalForces( globalInternalForces );
00236   baseSystem->assembleExternalForces( globalExternalForces );
00237 
00238   residue = globalMass*qddot;
00239   residue += globalInternalForces;
00240   residue -= globalExternalForces;
00241 
00242 //   cout << "qddot : " << qddot;
00243 //   cout << "q : " << q;
00244 //   cout << "globalMass*qddot : " << globalMass*qddot;
00245 //   cout << "globalInternalForces : " << globalInternalForces;
00246 //   cout << "globalExternalForces : " << globalExternalForces;
00247 }

00249 void Simulation::dynamicTangent( lmx::Matrix< data_type > & tangent_in,
00250                           const lmx::Vector< data_type > & q,
00251                           const lmx::Vector< data_type > & qdot,
00252                           double partial_qdot,
00253                           double partial_qddot,
00254                                 double time
00255                         )
00256 {
00257   tangent_in.fillIdentity(0.);
00258   baseSystem->calcTangentMatrix(  );
00259   baseSystem->assembleTangentMatrix( tangent_in );
00260   tangent_in += (data_type)partial_qddot*globalMass;
00261 }
00262 
00263 bool Simulation::dynamicConvergence( const lmx::Vector<data_type>& q,
00264                               const lmx::Vector<data_type>& qdot,
00265                               const lmx::Vector<data_type>& qddot,
00266                               double time
00267                             )
00268 {
00269   lmx::Vector<data_type> res( qddot.size() );
00270   res = globalMass*qddot + globalInternalForces - globalExternalForces;
00271   if( res.norm2() <= 10E-5 ){
00272     if( baseSystem->checkAugmented() ){
00273       baseSystem->outputStep( q, qdot );
00274       baseSystem->clearAugmented();
00275       return 1;
00276     }
00277     else return 0;
00278   }
00279   else return 0;
00280 
00281 }

00284 void Simulation::staticResidue ( lmx::Vector< data_type > & residue,
00285                                  lmx::Vector< data_type > & q
00286                                )
00287 {
00288   std::map<int,Node*>::iterator itNodes;
00289   for( itNodes = nodes.begin();
00290        itNodes!= nodes.end();
00291        ++itNodes
00292      )
00293   {
00294     itNodes->second->setx( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) ) );
00295     itNodes->second->sety( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) + 1 ) );
00296     if (Simulation::getDim() == 3)
00297       itNodes->second->setz( q.readElement( Simulation::dimension*(itNodes->first) + 2 ) );
00298   }
00299 
00300   globalInternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00301   globalExternalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00302 
00303   baseSystem->calcInternalForces();
00304   baseSystem->calcExternalForces();
00305   baseSystem->assembleInternalForces( globalInternalForces );
00306   baseSystem->assembleExternalForces( globalExternalForces );
00307 
00308   residue = globalInternalForces;
00309   residue -= globalExternalForces;
00310 
00311 //   cout << "qddot : " << qddot;
00312 //   cout << "q : " << q;
00313 //   cout << "globalMass*qddot : " << globalMass*qddot;
00314 //   cout << "globalInternalForces : " << globalInternalForces;
00315 //   cout << "globalExternalForces : " << globalExternalForces;
00316 }

00320                                )

00322   tangent_in.fillIdentity(0.);
00323   baseSystem->calcTangentMatrix(  );

00325 }
00326 
00327 bool Simulation::staticConvergence ( lmx::Vector<data_type>& res,
00328                                      lmx::Vector<data_type>& q
00329                                    )
00330 {
00331 //   lmx::Vector<data_type> res( qddot.size() );
00332 //   res =  globalInternalForces - globalExternalForces;
00333   if( res.norm2() <= 10E-5 ){
00334     if( baseSystem->checkAugmented( ) ){ // if convergence...
00335       baseSystem->outputStep( q );
00336       baseSystem->clearAugmented();
00337       return 1;
00338     }
00339     else return 0;
00340   }
00341   else return 0;
00342 
00343 }

00346 void Simulation::stepTriggered( ){
00347   if(contact=="GLOBAL" || visualization==1){
00348     this->theContact->updatePoints();
00349     this->theContact->updateLines();
00350     if(contact=="GLOBAL")
00351       this->theContact->updateDelaunay();
00352     this->theContact->drawObjects();
00353   }
00354 }
